replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Mr.Nima 发表于 2011-9-18 11:41 
你的地址不能上去 下载的是MOD
你还是给个安装MOD方法吧 需要什么版本的ModLoader
 之类的 
... 那個帖子的發問者就有放傳送槍的官網連結了啊...
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... n-and-smp/#p3116022

Uses Risugami's Modloader and Audiomod and Flan's ModLoaderMp Client for the client.

Vanilla servers require Flan's ModLoaderMp while Bukkit servers require krnlyng's ModLoaderMp!
Also uses ShockAhPI, though Optional.

Uses blockIDs 104 - 112, itemIDs 13201-13209 by default. Can be changed in properties.

The Server's basic properties are saved in the world folder.
Server's have a new command which lets you change these properties while in the server.

/pg <property> <new value>

Eg: /pg turretMode 3

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 你当mc是无敌的可以爱装几个mod就装几个啊 看代码就知道是mod冲突 装一个试一下 哪个mod是绝对兼容的
